name: @monkvision/sights
description: Monk sights library providing sight details and overlays
author: monkvision

scripts.clean: rimraf dist lib src/lib/data && mkdirp dist lib
scripts.compile: yarn run clean && yarn run svgo && tsc -p tsconfig.compile.json
scripts.build:development: yarn run compile && node dist/index.js && tsc -p tsconfig.build.development.json
scripts.build:production: yarn run compile && node dist/index.js && tsc -p tsconfig.build.production.json
scripts.svgo:wireframe: find ./research/data -type f -name '*.svg' -exec dirname \{\} \;|sort -u | grep 'partSelectionWireframes'| xargs -I \{\} -P 4 npx svgo \{\}
scripts.svgo:all: find ./research/data -type f -name '*.svg' -exec dirname \{\} \;|sort -u | grep -v 'partSelectionWireframes'| xargs -I \{\} -P 4 npx svgo \{\} --config ../../configs/svgo-config/index.js
scripts.svgo: yarn run svgo:wireframe && yarn run svgo:all
scripts.lint: yarn run prettier && yarn run eslint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run prettier:fix && yarn run eslint:fix && echo "Running SVGO on package overlays..." && yarn run svgo
